current.name: Blank Disposable Non-Surgical Face Mask
current.description: Designed to keep your employees and customers safe, these ear-loop face masks are a welcomed gift. They are made with three layers of non-woven fabric, including a high-density filter layer that protects the mouth and face from liquid, airborne particles, allergens, and dust. Please note that these come blank and are not medical grade. Masks are CE approved in accordance with EU Directive on Medical Devices 93/42 / EEC, Annex VII, Class 1 Type II & Type IIR approved in accordance with EN 14683.
